name: YMCA Hostel
description:
YMCA Hostel is a Qualmark certified 4+ star backpacker property which has been awarded a Gold Enviro Award for our commitment towards the environment. The hostel is a part of an International Non-Profit Organisation, which strives for a positive impact on our community. 

YMCA Hostel is nestled in the heart of Auckland City, offering diverse types of rooms and length of stays. All the rooms have a bed, bar fridge, linen and wardrobe. We provide clean and comfortable rooms at affordable prices.

2 minutes' walk from Karangahape Road, Auckland's multi-cultural suburb and clubbing district.
5 minutes' walk from Queen Street, the CBD with fantastic shopping.
10 minutes' walk from Ponsonby, Auckland's trendiest inner-city suburb full of bars restaurants and cafes.
15 minutes' walk from Auckland University and AUT, some of New Zealand's premier education and training institutions.

You'll also find yourself near the Waitemata harbor, beautiful Auckland beaches, parks and gardens and the bus station, railway station and ferry terminal.

YMCA also offers Laundry Facilities with Washing Powder, Free Wireless Internet, Public Lounge with Sky Satellite TV, Free Pool Table, Foosball Table and Ping Pong table, Kitchenette with Cutlery and Kitchen essentials, Telephone Booth to make outgoing calls or receive incoming calls and Public Parking from 6pm ~ 7am on Weekdays and All-Day Weekends (chargeable).

We are not only great for backpackers and travelers but also ideal long-term accommodation for students and those working in the CBD. We also offer accommodation options for groups.

==============================

Check in time is 2.00pm. Check out time is 10.00am. Penalty for late check-out is $20.

Credit card payments may incur a 2% convenience charge. 

Valid Passport ID must be present upon check-in. The property will take a copy of your photo ID. Failure to present this will result in the guest being unable to check-in, and a cancellation fee equal to the first night's charge. 

Guests arriving prior to 2.00pm are informed that early check-in is entirely dependent on the room status on the day itself. If their room is not yet ready, guests can store their luggage in the storage room while they wait.

location.address1: Corner Pitt street and Greys Avenue

houseRules.notes:
Check in time is 2.00pm. Check out time is 10.00am. Penalty for late check-out is $20.

Credit card payments may incur a 2% convenience charge. 

Valid Passport ID must be present upon check-in. The property will take a copy of your photo ID. Failure to present this will result in the guest being unable to check-in, and a cancellation fee equal to the first night's charge. 

1. Bond for Long-Stay Guests (7+ Nights):

A $50 refundable bond is required for all stays of 7 nights or more.

The bond is payable at check-in and may be used to cover:

Damages to rooms or property

Excessive cleaning

Unpaid charges or incidentals

Provided no issues arise, the bond will be refunded within 5–10 working days after check-out.

2. Credit Card Pre-Authorisation for Short-Stay Guests (Less than 7 Nights):

A $50 credit card pre-authorisation is required for all stays of less than 7 nights.

This is a temporary hold (not a charge) and will be released by your bank after departure, typically within 7–10 working days, depending on your card provider.

Guests must provide a valid credit card at check-in. Failure to do so may result in refusal of accommodation.

Guests arriving prior to 2.00pm are informed that early check-in is entirely dependent on the room status on the day itself. If their room is not yet ready, guests can store their luggage in the storage room while they wait.

For the comfort and enjoyment of all our guests we ask that you comply with any internal policies provided by YMCA that would relate to the reduction of noise and disturbance that may affect other guests during their stay.

Please note that the person registering at check in must be a minimum 18 years of age. There must be at least one adult of 18 years or older staying in the booked accommodation room(s).
